TextEng: Then how can you serve me?
Text: 그럼 어떻게 날 섬길 수 있어?

TextEng: Fine. I shall see these shadow wares.
What do you mean <Lord/Lady> of this estate?
Text: 이 영지의 영주라는 게 무슨 뜻이야?

TextEng: Are the Shadovar always so quick to accept a new <Master/Mistress>?
Text: 섀도바는 늘 그렇게 빨리 새 주인을 받아들여?

TextEng: "Please return to the city core and protect the Seer."
"I need you to guard the right inner tower."
"I need you to guard the right outer tower."
"I need you to guard the left inner tower."
"I need you to guard the left outer tower."
"I need you to guard the courtyard."
